title: Great Location to Enjoy This Weather!
posting_body: The Beach House Apartments, 206 Caledonia St., Sausalito, CA, 94965
We have a sunny studio on the 2nd floor available now!
Our location is only minutes to the Golden Gate Bridge, making for an easy commute into the city.

We are convenient to many city offices, most municipalities nearby, quaint shops, fabulous restaurants, local library, parks to stroll in, a dog park, many bike paths, and a boat launch for kayaks and paddle boards.
We also have easy access to all types of public transportation, buses and the ferry terminals nearby.
This unit features...
* Gas stove
* Carpet in living room and bedroom
* Water/garbage and utilities paid by tenants
* Onsite laundry facilities
All apartments open out into the courtyard that has a seating area to relax and enjoy the garden area.
It also has a gas grill for those summer evening barbeques.
We have a sundeck and a community courtyard, all in a fun, friendly, family atmosphere.
There are also laundry facilities onsite.
Currently there is no parking space available on the property, but street parking permits available for $35 a month until we have a space open up for you.
We are a pet friendly community.
However, there are some breed restrictions and all must meet with manager's approval.
*Pet deposit is $500...pet rent is additional per month...
$70/per dog and $35/per cat
*Security deposit is equal to a month's rent...one year lease only
*All utilities are paid for by the tenant
*Equal Housing Opportunity
*We NEVER charge you an application fee!
Applicants MUST provide their most recent income verification with three months of  documents before application can be run.
Income requirement amount is 2.5x the monthly rent.
Only qualified applicants need apply.
Please visit this website to apply online <URL>
Please contact Lauren and Don at
show contact info
for your own private tour of the apartment.
If you're leaving a message in our absence, please speak slowly, leaving your name and phone number.
We will be sure to return your call shortly thereafter.
